summary.description:
a manually curated database of lysosomal enzymes associated with rare diseases.

RareLSD: Database for Human Lysosomal Enzymes.

RareLSD: A Database for Human Lysosomal Enzymes. RareLSD is a manually curated database of 63 lysosomal enzymes present in the humans. Deficiency or malfunctioning of any enzyme leads to accumulation of toxic metabolites and thus, various storage defects. One major application of this database is, all the necessary information about these enzymes can be found in this portal
summary.name: RareLSD
